description:
The police are investigating Chris Williamson, a former Labour MP and the current Deputy Leader of George Galloway's Workers Party of Britain, after he said that Israel "has forfeited any right to exist".

The post George Galloway’s Deputy Under Investigation for Saying Israel “Has Forfeited Any Right to Exist” appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: George Galloway’s Deputy Under Investigation for Saying Israel “Has Forfeited Any Right to Exist”

description:
A row has erupted between the Football Association and a leading girls' league over the admission of a boy to matches, with the league facing potential sanctions for refusing to comply.

The post Top Girls’ Football League Faces Being Shut Down by the Football Association for Refusing to Allow a Boy to Play in Its Matches appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: Top Girls’ Football League Faces Being Shut Down by the Football Association for Refusing to Allow a Boy to Play in Its Matches

description:
The controversial judge facing criticism for leniency towards women celebrating Hamas's "paraglider" attacks, is accused of breaching the judiciary's code of conduct by discussing the imprisonment of a police officer.

The post Judge Who Didn’t Jail “Paraglider” Protesters Accused of Violating Code of Conduct appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: Judge Who Didn’t Jail “Paraglider” Protesters Accused of Violating Code of Conduct

description:
A new "racial justice unit" is being established by the Church of England to combat racism, including a £36,000-a-year position for a "deconstructing whiteness" officer.

The post CofE to Hire ‘Deconstructing Whiteness’ Officer appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: CofE to Hire ‘Deconstructing Whiteness’ Officer

description:
Data linking excess deaths to Covid vaccines is being demanded by MPs and peers, amid rising calls for the Government to prove it's claim that there is "no evidence" connecting excess deaths to the COVID-19 vaccines.

The post Health Secretary Urged to Release Data That ‘May Link Covid Vaccine to Excess Deaths’ appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: Health Secretary Urged to Release Data That ‘May Link Covid Vaccine to Excess Deaths’

description:
The Government did not pay sufficient attention to the long-term collateral damage of lockdowns, two thirds of British scientists surveyed believe.

The post Ministers Failed to Consider Long-Term Pain of Lockdown, Say Two-Thirds of Scientists appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: Ministers Failed to Consider Long-Term Pain of Lockdown, Say Two-Thirds of Scientists

description:
When it comes to who was behind the lab leak that may have started the pandemic, fingers often point at China and the U.S. But what about the German-Chinese lab at the epicentre of the first outbreak, asks Robert Kogon.

The post The Greatest Story Never Told: German Virology in Wuhan – and Montana appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: The Greatest Story Never Told: German Virology in Wuhan – and Montana

description:
A summary of the most interesting stories in the past 24 hours that challenge the prevailing orthodoxy about the virus and the vaccines, the ‘climate emergency’ and the supposed moral defects of Western civilisation.

The post News Round-Up appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: News Round-Up
